ack.p: We thank Martha Nason for help with statistical analyses, and members of the Immunology and Virology laboratories of the VRC for critical comments, suggestions, and assistance. We thank the VRC Vaccine Production Program Laboratory for large scale mAb production and cell line development (Elizabeth Scheideman, Daniel Blackstock, Jacob Demirji, Lena Wang, Sara Witter Zafar, Abasha Williams, Stephanie Golub, Joe Horwitz, Jiayan Cai, Daniel Gowetski, Daniel Ragheb, Nga Tran, Paula Lei, Jonathan Cooper, KC Cheng, and Frank Arnold). We thank Randy Fast, Kelli Oswald and Rebecca Shoemaker of the Quantitative Molecular Diagnostic Section of the AIDS and Cancer Virus Program of the Frederick National Laboratory for excellent technical assistance with viral load measurements. The content of this publication does not necessarily reflect the views or policies of the Department of Health and Human Services, nor does mention of trade names, commercial products, or organizations imply endorsement by the U.S. Government.
